Method Detail

getAchievements

public static void getAchievements(AGResponseCallback<GetAchievementsResponse> callback,
                                   java.lang.Object... userData)
Get the list of all visible achievements for the game. Visible achievements include those that were never hidden, and those that were once hidden but since made visible. Each Achievement object in the list includes the current players progress toward the Achievement. The passed callback will be called when the operation is complete. This is an asynchronous operation.

Parameters:
callback - Callback to call when the operation is complete.
userData - Optional user data. Delivered to the user as an array of objects.

getAchievements

public static AGResponseHandle<GetAchievementsResponse> getAchievements(java.lang.Object... userData)
Get the list of all visible achievements for the game. Visible achievements include those that were never hidden, and those that were once hidden but since made visible. Each Achievement object in the list includes the current players progress toward the Achievement. Returns a handle to poll for completion. This is an asynchronous operation.

Parameters:
userData - Optional user data. Delivered to the user as an array of objects.
Returns:
Returns a handle to poll for completion.

getAchievement

public static void getAchievement(java.lang.String achievementId,
                                  AGResponseCallback<GetAchievementResponse> callback,
                                  java.lang.Object... userData)
Get the achievement associated with the passed achievement ID. This is an asynchronous operation.

Parameters:
achievementId - Achievement ID to get.
callback - Callback to call when the operation is complete.
userData - Optional user data. Delivered to the user as an array of objects.

getAchievement

public static AGResponseHandle<GetAchievementResponse> getAchievement(java.lang.String achievementId,
                                                                      java.lang.Object... userData)
Get the achievement associated with the passed achievement ID. Returns a handle to poll for completion. This is an asynchronous operation.

Parameters:
achievementId - Achievement ID to get.
userData - Optional user data. Delivered to the user as an array of objects.
Returns:
Returns a handle to poll for completion.

updateProgress

public static void updateProgress(java.lang.String achievementId,
                                  float percentComplete,
                                  AGResponseCallback<UpdateProgressResponse> callback,
                                  java.lang.Object... userData)
Updates progress toward the specified achievement by the specified amount. If the submitted value is outside of range, it will be clamped to the 0 to 100 range inclusive. If the submitted value is less than the stored value, the update is ignored. The passed callback will be called when the operation is complete. This is an asynchronous operation.

Parameters:
achievementId - Achievement ID to update process on.
percentComplete - Floating point value between 0.0f and 100.0f
callback - Callback to call when the operation is complete.
userData - Optional user data. Delivered to the user as an array of objects.

updateProgress

public static AGResponseHandle<UpdateProgressResponse> updateProgress(java.lang.String achievementId,
                                                                      float percentComplete,
                                                                      java.lang.Object... userData)
Updates progress toward the specified achievement by the specified amount. If the submitted value is outside of range, it will be clamped to the 0 to 100 range inclusive. If the submitted value is less than the stored value, the update is ignored. Returns a handle to poll for completion. This is an asynchronous operation.

Parameters:
achievementId - Achievement ID to update process on.
percentComplete - Floating point value between 0.0f and 100.0f
userData - Optional user data. Delivered to the user as an array of objects.
Returns:
Returns a handle to poll for completion.

showAchievementsOverlay

public static AGResponseHandle<RequestResponse> showAchievementsOverlay()
Show the AmazonGames achievements overlay.

Returns:
Returns a ServiceResponse that contains the ErrorCode if any
